front.title: AS2 Restart for Very Large Messages

abstract.t: AS2 Restart provides a method for AS2 clients and servers to restartpayload transfers from the point of failure without requiring theentire document to be resent.KeywordsThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.
